text: Ej Parvardigori mo, moro ʙa saʙaʙi gunohamon ʙaroi kofiron fitanae magardon va onhoro ʙar mo ƣoliʙ magardon, to nagujand agar onho (ja'ne, ahli imon) ʙarhaq meʙudand, ʙa azoʙu xori giriftor namesudand, pas ongoh in ʙoisi zijodsavii kufri onon mesavad. Va gunohoni moro ʙijomurz, ki haroina, Tu piruzmandi, hargiz maƣluʙ namesavi va dar guftoru korhojat ʙo hikmat hasti
